pages.title: RailCraft
pages.text: A simple mod that adds various bridges. This is mainly a companion mod to RailCraft to make railways prettier but can be used for all kids of purposes.

pages.title: Getting Started
pages.text: The next few pages will show you the recipes for each bridge type.

pages.title: Recipes
pages.text: These are the bridge types and recipes for Macaw's Bridges
